Social And Cultural Activities: Acted in plays during school and college days
Sports and Clubs: Playing soccer, cricket and hockey; Member, (i) Delhi Gymkhana Club and (ii) India Habitat Centre
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Reading, music, watching movies and sports
Other Information: Practising Senior Advocate in the Supreme Court of India and various High Courts (Cuttack, Delhi, Bombay, Pujab, Jammu, Simla, Lucknow and Allahabad) specialisation in Corporate Law, Foreign Exchange, Customs Laws, Constitutional Laws.
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Participated in and won many prestigious debates/ contests during the school and college days
Educational Qualifications: B.A.(Hons) History., LL.B. Educated at St. Stephen`s College and Faculty of Law, Delhi University, Delhi
